metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3448 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
REST client for Ruby (aka rest-client) before 1.7.3 logs usernames andpasswords, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information byreading the log.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3448` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-rest-client - 1.8.0-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-rest-client package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-2ubuntu1').
